1.description: Punch a tree until a block of wood pops out.
1.detailed_description: Pick up a log from the ground.

2.description: Craft a workbench with four blocks of wooden planks.
2.detailed_description: Pick up a crafting table from the inventory's crafting field output or a crafting table output.

3.description: Use planks and sticks to make a pickaxe.
3.detailed_description: Pick up any type of pickaxe from a crafting table output.

4.detailed_description: Pick up a stone pickaxe from a crafting table output.

5.description: Construct a furnace out of eight cobblestone blocks.
5.detailed_description: Pick up a furnace from a crafting table output.

6.detailed_description: Pick up an iron ingot from a furnace output.

7.detailed_description: Pick up any type of hoe from a crafting table output.

8.detailed_description: Pick up bread from a crafting table output.

9.description: Bake a cake using: wheat, sugar, milk, and eggs
9.detailed_description: Pick up a cake from a crafting table output.

10.detailed_description: Pick up a cooked cod after cooking it in a Furnace, Smoker, Campfire, or Soul Campfire. Doesn't work if the block used is hooked up to a hopper, as the player is not getting the item directly from the output.

11.description: Travel by minecart to a point at least 500m in a single direction from where you started
11.detailed_description: Travel by minecart 500 blocks in a straight line away from the player's starting point.

12.description: Use planks and sticks to make a sword.
12.detailed_description: Pick up any type of sword from a crafting table output.

13.detailed_description: Kill a hostile mob or one of the following neutral mobs: an enderman, a piglin, a zombified piglin, a spider, or a cave spider.

14.detailed_description: Pick up leather from the ground.

15.description: Use a saddle to ride a pig, and then have the pig get hurt from fall damage while riding it.
15.detailed_description: Be riding a pig (e.g. using a saddle) when it hits the ground with a fall distance greater than 5.

16.description: Kill a Skeleton with an arrow from more than 50 meters.
16.detailed_description: Use a launched arrow to kill a skeleton, spider jockey, wither skeleton, or a stray from 50 or more blocks away, horizontally.

17.description: Acquire diamonds with your iron tools.
17.detailed_description: Pick up a diamond from the ground.

18.detailed_description: Breed two cows or two mooshrooms.

19.detailed_description: Drop a diamond. Another player or a mob must then pick up this diamond.

21.detailed_description: Pick up an enchantment table from a crafting table output.

22.description: Build some bookshelves to improve your enchantment table.
22.detailed_description: Pick up a bookshelf from a crafting table output.

23.description: Deal nine hearts of damage in a single hit.
23.detailed_description: Damage can be dealt to any mob, even those that do not have nine hearts of health overall.
